original_text: I took them to the land which I had promised to give to them. But when they were there, they continued to offer sacrifices to idols. They did this on every high hill or under every green tree that they saw! They burned sweet incense and they poured out wine as offerings in all those places. That made me very angry.
korean_text: 내가 내 손을 들어 그들에게 주기로 맹세한 땅으로 그들을 인도하여 들였더니 그들이 모든 높은 산과 모든 무성한 나무를 보고 거기에서 제사를 드리고 분노하게 하는 제물을 올리며 거기서 또 분향하고 전제물을 부어 드린지라

sentences.original_text: I took them to the land
which I had promised to give to them
they continued to offer sacrifices to idols
They did this on every high hill
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 높은 모든 언덕에서 이렇게 했습니다

sentences.original_text: or under every green tree that they saw
sentences.korean_translation: 또는 그들이 본 모든 푸른 나무 아래에서

sentences.original_text: and they poured out wine as offerings
